channel.title: Wassup Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.2.1
item.description:
• Cleaned up a lot of bad DSL code making it cleaner for new builders
  • Actions (buttons) can now have a label and/or an image
  • Default GitHubSearch open action now uses image for open to make look cleaner
  • Action modifer now had clearPrevious argument to override default actions (unsure if i'll keep this)
